title: How many songs have BTS released? - Quora

response.answer_text: [2nd October 2020] Without counting pre-debut works, covers, re-releases, remixes and multiple/japanese/chinese versions, BTS has a total of 148 songs on 8 studio albums + 1 soundtrack album + 2 reissues + 2 compilation albums + 6 EPs + 5 single-albums, 29 songs as non-album releases/featured artist/producer and 43 songs on 5 mixtapes for a total of 219 songs. 2 Cool 4 Skool 1.
